body:
Currently in https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/hip/package.py we build with `HIP_PLATFORM=rocclr`, but in `setup_dependent_build_environment` we use `HIP_PLATFORM=hcc`.

Can you please comment on this @srekolam / @arjun-raj-kuppala / @amd-toolchain-support? What should the value be?
title: HIP_PLATFORM inconsistency
